snippet: Tucker West won a World Cup luge race in Lake Placid, N.Y., making him the first American man to prevail on the circuit in nearly 18 years.
abstract: Tucker West wins World Cup luge race in Lake Placid, NY, making him the first American man to prevail on circuit in nearly 18 years.
lead_paragraph: Tucker West won a World Cup luge race in Lake Placid, N.Y., making him the first American man to prevail on the circuit in nearly 18 years.

headline.main: American Ends an 18-Year Drought in the Luge
